DOC.HEADLINE: REGIONAL STUDENT FILMS TO SCREEN AT LOYOLA
DOC.TEXT: Loyola Marymount University will screen the regional finalists in the Academy of Motion_Picture Arts and Sciences ' 21st Annual Student Academy Awards on May 6 and 7 at 7 p.m. in the school ' s Mayer Theater.The screenings are free and open_to the public . A jury that includes film editor Jules Engel and Times film critic Peter Rainer will judge the films , and the winners will be announced following the screening . Finalists in the dramatic category will be shown May 6 and animation finalists will be shown May 7 . There were no experimental finalists selected in the region .
